SEARCH
Package emissary.util.search

Class ByteMatcher

java.lang.Object
emissary.util.search.ByteMatcher
public class ByteMatcher extends Object
This class provides some simple string matching functions on byte arrays

      public void resetData(byte[] data)

      Parameters:
      data - - bytes to match against

    • getValue

      public String getValue(String key, int ofs, String delim)
      Find tags of the form "Key{token}Value" returning "Value" when "Key" is supplied. The value goes after the {token} to the end of the line.

    • getValue

      public String getValue(String key, int ofs)
